history.proof: intros H. unfold ex_lim in H. destruct H as [l H]. unfold ex_lim. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_lim_scal_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a : R x, l : Rbar H : is_lim f x l P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Rbar_mult ?M2373 ?M2375 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (a * l) eps y -> P y".
In environment f : R -> R a : R x, l : Rbar H : is_lim f x l Unable to unify "is_lim f x l" with "is_lim (fun y : R => a * f y) x (a * l)".

original: intros H. unfold ex_lim in H. destruct H as [l H]. unfold ex_lim. exists (a * l). apply is_lim_scal_l. apply H.
